title: About - ssbpm.info
1: ssbpm.info is an informational / educational website about the video game modification "Project M" of the 2008 Nintendo Wii game Super Smash Bros. Brawl. Any people related to this site can not be held liable for any damage that might occur by following guides from this website.
2: ssbpm.info is being maintained by the european Project M gaming community.
3: For details, information and inquiries, please [contact](/contact/) waffeln, the lead maintainer.
5: This project is licensed under the GNU PL v3 license.
